text:
What's up everyone! Today we're learning English 
with the award-winning hit movie La La Land! Don't

worry if you're not a fan of musicals because 
the clip that we've selected for today's lesson

is actually a scene where the main characters 
played by Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone

actually talk about hopes 
dreams and their relationship.

So if you continue watching you'll learn how 
to speak English naturally and learn lots of

vocabulary that we use in daily conversation 
just like Lily who says that her English is

now actually making sense because that's what we 
do! Every week you have three free lessons from us

here and we help you to learn fast natural English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. So make sure you hit 
that subscribe button and the bell down below

so that you join our community and to improve 
your English and continue learning with us

If you want to become an advanced learner 
and break through that intermediate plateau

I highly recommend you check out this lesson that 
Ethan made over on the Real Life English Channel.

You can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch it next.
